name: Ninjakul 2: The Last Ninja
description:
After his brother's death, Akul, the last ninja of his clan, will claim for revenge by defeating the opium mafia: The Gunshi Clan. 

In this action platform game you will have to find the four sacred scrolls and fight against Gunshi Clan and its guardians. After the first four zones are cleared you will have to play the final stage and destroy Paco Romita, the big boss. 

Features

  •  Action Platform genre
  • 5 stages + prologue (4 available  from the begining)
  • 4 power ups types.
  • 3 dificulty levels to choose
  • Redefinible keys
  • More than 8 awesome tunes!
  • Secret hidden items.
  • Many different type of enemies.
  • Tons of love to create it :P

This is a ZX Spectrum 128K game. You can play it using a Spectrum emulator or a real ZX Spectrum 128K/+2/A/B/+3  computer. 

* The game will be for free from 2019/03/01 but if you can't wait you can play it for only 1€ and help to finance a first physical edition in cartridge format (dandanator or similar). More information in devlog here:
